author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/72

#### PR description:

Title says it all.
At the beginning of PCL times, all the workflows were for Tracker calibration, so it made sense to put `PCLMetadataWriter` in `Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducers`. Now, with the proliferation of workflows from other subsystems, it makes sense to push it somewhere more central. I identified `CommonTools/ConditionDBWriter` as a potential candidate.
Profited of the PR to modernize the loops.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
Tested in dry mode: `runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.0,1001.2,1001.3 -j 0`

title: move `PCLMetadataWriter` from `Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducers` to `CommonTools/ConditionDBWriter`
